data.eml:eml: Two new species of lotic breeding salamanders (Amphibia, Caudata, Hynobiidae) from western Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tominaga, Atsushi, Matsui, Masafumi, Nishikawa, Kanto (2019): Two new species of lotic breeding salamanders (Amphibia, Caudata, Hynobiidae) from western Japan. Zootaxa 4550 (4): 525-544, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4550.4.3
